hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select Centro as "id", Descripcion as "nombre" from HR_CentroEstudios order by Descripcion
select Centro as "id", Descripcion as "nombre" from HR_CentroEstudios where Centro = :p_centro
select count(1) from Hr_Centroestudios ce where ce.Centro = ISNULL(:p_id_centro_estudios,ce.centro) and ce.Descripcion like '%' + ISNULL(UPPER(:p_nombre),ce.descripcion) + '%'

select ce.Centro as "id" ,ce.Descripcion as "nombre" ,CAST(ce.Estado AS VARCHAR) as "estadoId" from Hr_Centroestudios ce where ce.Centro = ISNULL(:p_id_centro_estudios,ce.centro) and ce.Descripcion like '%' + ISNULL(UPPER(:p_nombre),ce.descripcion) + '%' --and ISNULL(ce.Estado,'A') = ISNULL(:p_id_estado,ISNULL(ce.estado,'A')) ORDER BY ce.Descripcion

select ce.Centro as "id" ,ce.Descripcion as "nombre" from Hr_Centroestudios ce where ce.Centro = ISNULL(:p_centro,ce.centro) and ce.Descripcion like '%' + ISNULL(UPPER(:p_descripcion),ce.descripcion) + '%' ORDER BY ce.Descripcion

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM HR_CENTROESTUDIOS A LEFT JOIN MA_MISCELANEOSDETALLE B ON A.TIPOINSTITUCION = B.CODIGOELEMENTO AND APLICACIONCODIGO = 'PR' AND CODIGOTABLA = 'TIPOINST' AND COMPANIA = '999999' WHERE A.ESTADO = 'A' AND CAST(A.CENTRO AS VARCHAR) LIKE '%' + CAST(ISNULL(:p_centro, A.CENTRO) AS VARCHAR) + '%' AND ISNULL(A.DESCRIPCION, '-') LIKE '%' + ISNULL(:p_descripcion, ISNULL(A.DESCRIPCION, '-')) + '%' AND ISNULL(A.REGIMEN, '-') = ISNULL(:p_regimen, ISNULL(A.REGIMEN, '-')) AND ISNULL(A.TIPOINSTITUCION, '-') = ISNULL(:p_tipo, ISNULL(A.TIPOINSTITUCION, '-'))

SELECT A.CENTRO as "centro", A.DESCRIPCION as "descripcion", A.REGIMEN as "regimen", CASE WHEN A.REGIMEN = '1' THEN 'PÃºblica' WHEN A.REGIMEN = '2' THEN 'Privada' ELSE '' END as "regimenDescripcion", A.REPRESENTANTE as "representante", A.REPRESENTANTEDOC as "representantedoc", B.VALORCODIGO1 as "tipo", A.CODIGORTPS as "rtps" FROM HR_CENTROESTUDIOS A LEFT JOIN MA_MISCELANEOSDETALLE B ON A.TIPOINSTITUCION = B.CODIGOELEMENTO AND APLICACIONCODIGO = 'PR' AND CODIGOTABLA = 'TIPOINST' AND COMPANIA = '999999' WHERE A.ESTADO = 'A' AND CAST(A.CENTRO AS VARCHAR) LIKE '%' + CAST(ISNULL(:p_centro, A.CENTRO) AS VARCHAR) + '%' AND ISNULL(A.DESCRIPCION, '-') LIKE '%' + ISNULL(:p_descripcion, ISNULL(A.DESCRIPCION, '-')) + '%' AND ISNULL(A.REGIMEN, '-') = ISNULL(:p_regimen, ISNULL(A.REGIMEN, '-')) AND ISNULL(A.TIPOINSTITUCION, '-') = ISNULL(:p_tipo, ISNULL(A.TIPOINSTITUCION, '-')) ORDER BY A.DESCRIPCION ASC

SELECT HR_CentroEstudiosProfesion.Centro AS "centro", HR_CentroEstudiosProfesion.Profesion AS "profesion", HR_Profesion.Descripcion AS "profesionDescripcion", HR_CentroEstudiosProfesion.CodigoRTPS AS "profesionRtps", HR_Profesion.Area AS "profesionArea", UPPER(RTRIM(MISC.DescripcionLocal)) as "profesionAreaDescripcion" FROM HR_Profesion INNER JOIN HR_CentroEstudiosProfesion ON HR_Profesion.Profesion = HR_CentroEstudiosProfesion.Profesion LEFT JOIN MA_MISCELANEOSDETALLE MISC ON HR_Profesion.Area = MISC.CODIGOELEMENTO AND MISC.APLICACIONCODIGO = 'HR' AND MISC.CODIGOTABLA = 'AREAS' AND MISC.COMPANIA = '999999' WHERE HR_CentroEstudiosProfesion.Centro = :p_centro ORDER BY HR_Profesion.Descripcion ASC
